package.name: marble_hd2_sensor_config_3
package.description: The marble_hd2_sensor_config_3 track vehicle package - Forward facing HD Camera - Backward facing HD Camera - Downward tilted depth camera based on the Intel Realsense d435 - Horizontal OS1-64 3D Laser C - Vertical OS1-64 3D Laser C - Planar lidar (RPLidar S1) - Microstrain 3DMGX5-25 IMU (AHRS) - Gas sensor - Weight: about 75 lbs
package.author: Derek Vasquez
Neil Johnson
Hector Escobar
